|brand = Enterasys |model = WS-AP3705i |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = QXO-WSAP3705I |icid = 4138A-WSAP3705 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 8RNLAP01.2A1G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 560<!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = ESMT;M14D5121632A-2.5B; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 20:B3:99 |oui = 20:B3:99
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.4 |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE)
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier;Microsemi;LX5535;MSC5535;2;InGaP HBT, 2.4-2.5 GHz; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier;Microsemi;LX5530;MSC5530;2;InGaP HBT, 4.5-6.0 GHz; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = RNL-AP01 |manuf_rev = .2A1G |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = End of Support Life |fccapprovdate = 07/05/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00AT4AQD8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00BRF01YC |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9582; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8RNLAP01..2A1G" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Probable 20:B3:99 OUI (it's on the FCC label) This device uses an [[Atheros]] SoC (probably AR9344) and an [[Atheros]] chip for the 5GHz radio.
==See also== *[[Enterasys WS-AP3660]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3705i]] *[[Enterasys WS-AP3715i Wireless Module]] *[[Extreme Networks AP3825i]] *[[Extreme Networks AP3825e]] *[[Extreme Networks AP505i]] *[[Extreme Networks AP510i]] *[[Extreme Networks AP-7612]] *[[Extreme Networks AP-7622]]
